text: Berberis taronensis is a shrub in the Berberidaceae described as a species in 1941.Ahrendt, Leslie Walter Allen. 1941. Journal of Botany, British and Foreign 79(Suppl.): 23 It is native to Tibet and Yunnan in China.Flora of China Vol. 19 Page 741 独龙小檗 du long xiao bo Berberis taronensis Ahrendt The species is listed as vulnerable.China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Berberis taronensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. Berberis taronensis should not be confused with Mahonia taronensis (a different species, also native to Yunnan and Tibet, synonymous with Berberis tibetensis).Flora of China, Vol. 19 Page 775 独龙十大功劳 du long shi da gong lao Mahonia taronensis Handel-Mazzetti ==References== Category:Flora of China taronensis Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Plants described in 1941 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Berberis taronensis
